h2_title: Yellow Loong Boss Fight and Guide
content: Twirling his glaive over his head will buy you a second until he finishes the animation before flying at you, but if he holds his glaive pointed behind him, you'll have the smallest of moments to dodge before he charges you. He may also hold his weapon under his other arm, or angle it downward, and each has its own timing.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Yellow_Loong.md', within the main section titled 'Yellow Loong', specifically from the subsection 'Yellow Loong Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
Twirling his glaive over his head will buy you a second until he finishes the animation before flying at you, but if he holds his glaive pointed behind him, you'll have the smallest of moments to dodge before he charges you. He may also hold his weapon under his other arm, or angle it downward, and each has its own timing.
